     *cpe:2.3:a:wordpress:wordpress:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:* versions up to (including) 2.3.3
     *cpe:2.3:a:wordpress:wordpress:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:* versions up to (including) 2.5.1

description: SQL injection vulnerability in play.php in EntertainmentScript 1.4.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the id parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-2393

description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in TAGWORX.CMS 3.00.02 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) cid parameter to contact.php and the (2) nid parameter to news.php.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-2394

description: SQL injection vulnerability in thread.php in AlkalinePHP 0.80.00 beta and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the id parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-2395

description: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability in index.php in Wajox Software microSSys CMS 1.5 and earlier, when register_globals is enabled, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in an arbitrary element of the PAGES array parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-2396

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in search-results.dot in dotCMS 1.x allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the search_query parameter.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-2397

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in index.php in AppServ Open Project 2.5.10 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the appservlang parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-2398

description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the FireFTP add-on before 0.98.20080518 for Firefox allows remote FTP servers to create or overwrite arbitrary files via ..\ (dot dot backslash) sequences in responses to (1) MLSD and (2) LIST commands, a related issue to CVE-2002-1345.  NOTE: this can be leveraged for code execution by writing to a Startup folder.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-2399

description: Unspecified vulnerability in stunnel before 4.23, when running as a service on Windows, allows local users to gain privileges via unknown attack vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-2400

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in AIM.DLL in Cerulean Studios Trillian before 3.1.10.0 allows user-assisted remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long attribute value in a FONT tag in a message.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-2407

description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the XML parsing functionality in talk.dll in Cerulean Studios Trillian Pro before 3.1.10.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a malformed attribute in an IMG tag.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-2408

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in Cerulean Studios Trillian before 3.1.10.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified attributes in the X-MMS-IM-FORMAT header in an MSN message.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-2409

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the servlet engine and Web container in the Web Server service in IBM Lotus Domino before 7.0.3 FP1, and 8.x before 8.0.1, allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-2410

description: SQL injection vulnerability in index.php in SazCart 1.5.1 and earlier, when magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the prodid parameter in a details action.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-2411

description: SQL injection vulnerability in glossaire.php in ACGV News 0.9.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the id parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-2412
